show_if_no_children.label: Show Category Blocks if No Sub-categories
show_if_no_children.comment: If set to "Yes", custom Category Blocks will be displayed in the drop-down box even if the category doesn't have any sub-categories.

static_identifier.label: Static block identifier:
static_identifier.comment: Which static block you want they show on menu (Once per line)

page_id.label: CMS Page Id:
page_id.comment: Which cms page you want they show on menu (Once per line)

label1.label: Label 1
label1.comment: Define the text of the category label 1. Labels can be assigned to every category in Catalog > Manage Categories.

label2.label: Label 2
label2.comment: Define the text of the category label 2. Labels can be assigned to every category in Catalog > Manage Categories.

layout_two_column.label: Products Each row (For Two column layout)

layout_three_column.label: Products Each row (For Three column layout)

standard_image_width.label: Standard product image width (px)
standard_image_width.comment: Standard size: 310px (This is image size max.It will be auto resize by products each row)

standard_image_height.label: Standard product image height (px)
standard_image_height.comment: Standard size: 424px (This is image size max.It will be auto resize by products each row)

rating_wishlist_compare.label: "Add to Wishlist" and "Add to Compare" buttons

product_hover_effect.label: Product hover effect
product_hover_effect.comment: Show shadow box when hover to product

product_page_layout.label: Detail page layout
product_page_layout.comment: Select layout for Shop page detail.

product_main_width.label: Main Image Width (px)
product_main_width.comment: If width is not specified, default width and height will be used (478 pixels).

product_main_height.label: Main Image Height (px)
product_main_height.comment: If width is not specified, default width and height will be used (654 pixels).

product_thumbnail_width.label: Thumbnail Image Width (px)
product_thumbnail_width.comment: If width is not specified, default width and height will be used (161 pixels).

product_thumbnail_height.label: Thumbnail Image Height (px)
product_thumbnail_height.comment: If width is not specified, default width and height will be used (220 pixels).

cookielifetime.label: Popup expires end
cookielifetime.comment: Set period in days after which popup will be shown again if customer has already subscribed or chosen option "Don't show this popup again". Set from 1 to infinite.
